channel.title: Comments on: Egg Shaped Sponge Tutorial

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/egg-shaped-sponge-tutorial/#comment-300">Suzi</a>.
I bet you see a huge difference using it wet. I knew to wet it, but I didn't know it was supposed to be THAT wet! Let me know how it goes!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

I bet you see a huge difference using it wet. I knew to wet it, but I didn’t know it was supposed to be THAT wet! Let me know how it goes!

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: I feel like a complete jackass...no one ever told me to wet mine! So I've been dry slopping foundation on my face for years. Even then, it seemed to do a pretty decent job, so I can't wait to see how it looks done the right way.
item.content:encoded: I feel like a complete jackass…no one ever told me to wet mine! So I’ve been dry slopping foundation on my face for years. Even then, it seemed to do a pretty decent job, so I can’t wait to see how it looks done the right way.
